title: Arkane Promises 'Redfall' Retains Its Unique DNA as a Studio | E3 2021
description:
During the Xbox E3 2021 press conference, Microsoft and Arkane Austin revealed Redfall, a new cooperative shooter from Arkane Austin. At first glance, many thought it was a big departure for what the studio is known for, but Arkane says otherwise.

title: Contraband - A Heist Game with Mad Max Vehicular Combat? | E3 2021
description:
Contraband, the next game from Avalanche Studios (Just Cause, Mad Max) was revealed at E3 2021 with a short teaser trailer, but lacked info on what the actual game is all about. Turns out, it might just be a heist game with a focus on Mad Max-like vehicle combat.
